Date: 2024-10-08 16:41
Subject: Scheduled Maintenance for AIA and WM9 - 12/10/2024
--------------------------------------------------
     



 

Notification: Essential Logistics Weekly Maintenance

______________________________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________________________ 

Dear Colleagues,

 

To ensure business continuity, we have scheduled essential maintenance to enhance the underlying infrastructure of the database systems for WMS and AIA

Saturday, October 12, 2024, | 10:00 PM – 11:59 PM GST

Please be aware that during this period, access to the Warehouse Application (WMS) and Oracle AIA will be temporarily unavailable.

 

If you require assistance during this time, kindly raise a support ticket via the following  link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C6c18849b8e5843ceebff08dce7966045%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638639880913302217%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=RuE%2FgA4ci%2FZMT3PY0dcIPgt3Xu80Ybttr6jERdf%2FhQQ%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Chalhoub Tech.
